name: Dungeon and Girls
description:
**** Release Sale 50% Off ****
- Brought to you by the developer of 'War of Eustrath' and 'Deep Deep Dungeon'!

Dungeon and card RPG with innovative new style!
Explore the infinite dungeons with your beautiful partner
By strategically manipulating randomly drawn cards,
you can defeat beautiful monsters and get new partners!
Challenge the dungeons by getting closer to your partners and upgrading cards!

Game Overview

Explore the random-generated dungeons using cards.
Monsters infesting these dungeons are all cute girls!
Strategic battle system using 4 kinds of card,
Attack, Heal, Counter, and Charge.
4 playable character classes with unique card decks and own sets of skills
Player level resets every time you enter a dungeon! Every run will be fresh and new!
Even if your level resets, You cute and powerful partner will be at your side so don't worry!
If you get closer to your partner by fighting together and giving presents,
she will get stronger, and who knows? She might get new skills, too!
Over 60 beautiful partners with unique characteristics and skills await you.
